fields.description: The unique identifier for the Summary Reimbursable Setup.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
A flag to set the Summary Reimbursable Setup to inactive. When the flag is set to inactive, you can no longer access this setup in your award cost processing.
The reference to the ledger type associated with the Summary Reimbursable Setup. It's a required field

Some ledger accounts in the ledger account summaries may be omitted in the calculation if the ledger accounts are retired, restricted to a different company, not part of an account set for the company you selected, or the types of ledger accounts that are ineligible for summary reimbursable calculation.
The reference to the journal source associated with the summary reimbursable setup.
When you don't enter a book code, only the Blank book code is eligible for summary reimbursable calculations.

Book_Codes_for_Summary_Reimbursable_Setu.description: When you don't enter a book code, only the Blank book code is eligible for summary reimbursable calculations.

Inactive_Setup.description: A flag to set the Summary Reimbursable Setup to inactive. When the flag is set to inactive, you can no longer access this setup in your award cost processing.

Ledger_Accounts_and_Ledger_Account_Summa.description: Some ledger accounts in the ledger account summaries may be omitted in the calculation if the ledger accounts are retired, restricted to a different company, not part of an account set for the company you selected, or the types of ledger accounts that are ineligible for summary reimbursable calculation.

Ledger_Types_for_Summary_Reimbursable_Se.description: The reference to the ledger type associated with the Summary Reimbursable Setup. It's a required field

Summary_Reimbursable_Setup_ID.description: The unique identifier for the Summary Reimbursable Setup.
